facts.fact_text: International arrivals to Vietnam rose by 18.5% year-on-year to 2.45 million in January 2026.

evidences.evidence_text: International arrivals to Vietnam rose by 18.5% year-on-year to 2.45 million in January 2026

facts.fact_text: January 2026 saw the highest number of tourist arrivals since records began in 2015.

evidences.evidence_text: the highest since records began in 2015

facts.fact_text: Arrivals from Asia increased by 12.3%, led by strong growth from Cambodia (122.7%), India (80.5%), Philippines (75.0%), Singapore (51.7%), and Malaysia (45.4%).

evidences.evidence_text: Arrivals from Asia increased by 12.3%, led by strong growth from Cambodia (122.7%), India (80.5%), Philippines (75.0%), Singapore (51.7%), and Malaysia (45.4%).

facts.fact_text: Visitors from the Americas also rose by 14.2%, particularly from the US (12.0%), Canada (22.9%), and other countries in the region (19.9%).

evidences.evidence_text: Visitors from the Americas also rose by 14.2%, particularly from the US (12.0%), Canada (22.9%), and other countries in the region (19.9%).

facts.fact_text: In Europe, arrivals surged by 59.0%, with notable increases from Russia (195.1%), the UK (23.0%), France (25.3%), and Germany (18.0%).

evidences.evidence_text: In Europe, arrivals surged by 59.0%, with notable increases from Russia (195.1%), the UK (23.0%), France (25.3%), and Germany (18.0%).

facts.fact_text: Tourists from Australia increased by 12.8%, while arrivals from Africa went up by 45.4%.

evidences.evidence_text: Tourists from Australia increased by 12.8%, while arrivals from Africa went up by 45.4%.

facts.fact_text: On a monthly basis, arrivals rose by 21.4%.

evidences.evidence_text: On a monthly basis, arrivals rose by 21.4%.

evidence.evidence_text: International arrivals to Vietnam rose by 18.5% year-on-year
